The guys a bitch, a pansy. "Righteous Bullshit" is what i call it. Way too emotional, but hey its still a great anime, funny as well with a bit of romantics thrown in, This is a really good show. 4.5/5 (on account of the stupidity of some of the characters)
Anyone know where to download the subtitles from? can't find them anywhere. great quality though and audio synced with visuals perfectly.
